A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've seen this movie twice with my wife. At the end of the second viewing my feelings did not change from that of the first. I believe Rian Johnson and Disney had a momentary lapse of reason. There is very little in this movie that I will remember fondly. As a matter of fact\, I'm done with this trilogy as it seems SWVII:TFA was a waste of time. I'll take the prequel and original trilogy's any day over this tripe. RIP
